text: Among the affected puppies, all were positive for C. difficile, 90.3% were positive for CPV-2b, 17.7% were positive for cpe, 9.7% were positive for cpa toxin, 6.4% were positive for E. coli shiga toxin (STEC), 6.4% were positive for E. coli -enterotoxin (LT), and 3.2% were positive for CDV ( Figure-1) . None of the puppies were shedding both the CPV and CDV together whereas, cpe together with cpa and LT were detected in two of the puppies with hemorrhagic diarrhea.
